question: Who is the head of the Committee formed to commemorate the 125th birth anniversary of Netaji Subash Chandra Bose?
explanation:
As per the recent gazette notification, a High-Level Committee, headed by the Prime Minister Narendra Modi, has been constituted to commemorate the 125th birth anniversary of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose.
As per the Union Culture Ministry, the Committee will decide on the nation-wide activities for the one year long commemoration, starting from 23rd January 2021. Several historians, authors and family members of Netaji are among the members of the Committee.
